entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:06 PM ADT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 6 except plus 2 along the coast. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 6 except plus 2 along the coast. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:06 PM ADT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 6. POP 30%
